text: Azali Assoumani (; born 1 January 1959) is a Comorian politician and military officer who has served as President of the Comoros from 2002 to 2006 and again since 2016. He became head of state after leading a coup d'Ã©tat in 1999 and was elected president in 2002, 2016 and April 2019. In 2023, he became the Chairperson of the African Union. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Comoros Category:Current national leaders Category:African military people
title: Azali Assoumani
